attributes.contentHtml:
TMKC I MIGHT be wrong here, but aren't you the guy who exit scammed Eraters? (Also, if you had your own machines, why did you have to use my web hosting?)

I don't have all the details, feel free to respond and such

attributes.bio:
Hi there! I am Sydney, your friendly Aussie web developer! I make things work, and I like hosting things

(I have an Iceey Certified TOS :3)

attributes.contentHtml:
Sydney I did not exit-scam Eraters. I decided to shut down ServerTop because it was not profitable enough to be self-sustained. I had bills for over 250 bucks a month and I got maybe 40 total from customers. I started ServerTop because my 2nd job gave me the funds to do it, but I was laid off due to COVID.

We used your webhosting because of pricing, We needed to look for ways to reduce costs.

We wanted to have the website separate from the server boxes so that if a node goes down, the website is still up (best practice).
